entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C

Visibility: 8.1 km

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
